name: Quaranteam Prototype
description:
Built for the Oculus Rift (and Oculus Quests linked to VR-Ready PCs), Health Impact Studio is developing a VR game for medical students and we have the base navigation and movement ready inside a hospital. In addition, we have added on our "dev room" if you can find it!

Please leave your early feedback, in the community topics below, on our basic navigation, movement, and general dialogue interaction.
